verse: चक्रधरोऽपि सुरत्वं सुरत्वलाभे सकलसुरपतित्वम्। भवितुं सुरपतिरूर्ध्व गतित्वं तथापि न निवर्तते तृष्णा।।

terms.चक्रधरोऽपि: Even though one holds the wheel (symbol of power),
terms.सुरत्वलाभे: in acquiring the status of a deity,
terms.सकलसुरपतित्वम्: being the lord of all gods,
terms.सुरपतिरूर्ध्व: a higher position among the gods,

meaning: Meaning: Even if one holds the wheel, symbolizing power, and acquires the status of a deity, becoming the lord of all gods, the desire for a higher position among the gods and the state of attainment still does not cease.
